item.title: Yancey County, NC
item.description: View my Google photo album of this trip. Also in the works is a video of our adventures and sight seeing. I spent part of my youth growing up on a beautiful farm outside of Burnsville, NC. We were a hard working family on a beautiful 120+ acre property fronting the Cane River where we raised beef cattle and grew tobacco and feed corn, eventually transitioning to blueberries, raspberries and blackberries.
